name: Imanente
description:
Sometimes the watcher finds himself in this Place;

Sometimes the watcher long to see beyond that Peace..

Every time the watcher remembers and regret it..

Every time the watcher carry out his duties;

That Light must be lit;

That Burden must be lift..

Will it worth anything?

Imanente is a 5 days experimental mood-piece and contains no "gameplay".

  • The experience is roughly 10 minutes long and should be finished in a single sitting play session.
  • Standard WASD + Mouse controls
  • We recommend to turn the lights-out and the use of headphones for better enjoyment.

Please support us by buying the game at suggested or higher price. That will help a lot with our bigger projects in development :)
